definition: Three Gorges on the Chang Jiang or Yangtze, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]/Sanxia or Sanhsia town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
surname San
three/3
gorge
Three Gorges or Yangtze Gorges, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]
Sanxia or Sanhsia town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Three Gorges Dam on the Yangtze River
Three Gorges Reservoir on the Changjiang or Yangtze

sentences.english: Yu from East Jiangzhou down to the Three Gorges, Three Gorges will begin dredging project.
sentences.chinese: 禹从江州东下来到了三峡，便开始疏浚三峡的工程。

sentences.english: Yu from East Jiangzhou down to the Three Gorges, Three Gorges will begin dredging project.
sentences.chinese: 禹从江州东下来到了三峡，便开始疏浚三峡的工程。

sentences.english: Reservoir bank collapse is an import geological problem which should have an effect on Three Gorges Reservoir Project.
sentences.chinese: 水库塌岸是影响三峡水库工程成败的重大地质问题。

sentences.english: The flooding reignites one of the key debates over the construction of the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 洪灾重新引发了就建设三峡大坝的主要争议之一。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is there, and is impossible to tear down.
sentences.chinese: 三峡大坝就在那里，并且不可能拆毁。

sentences.english: Dangerous rock is a main geological hazard in the reservoir area of the Three Gorges Project, especially in Wanzhou area.
sentences.chinese: 三峡库区危岩灾害极其发育，万州地区具有代表性。

sentences.english: Good morning, this is the Sanxia Airport, may I help you?
sentences.chinese: 早上好，这里是三峡机场，我能为你做点什么？

sentences.english: With the impounding of Three Gorges Project, study on this problem became urgent.
sentences.chinese: 随着三峡工程完工蓄水，这方面的研究显得愈加迫切。

sentences.english: It is a national one-level theme restaurant with Sanxia culture.
sentences.chinese: 是一家浓缩三峡文化的国家一级主题餐厅。

sentences.english: The second part is the introduction of the new journey after amalgamation.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分为新的历程，即三峡大学合并组建后的情况。

sentences.english: Sanxia Photo, Evidence of Our Love.
The dam further imperils delicate fish populations in the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 三峡大坝也进一步威胁着长江濒危鱼类的种群繁殖。

sentences.english: Sichuan is bordered by the Tibetan Plateau in the west and by the Three Gorges and the Yangtze River in the east.
sentences.chinese: 四川西临青藏高原而东接三峡和长江。

sentences.english: After the construction of the reservoir in the Three—gorge is completed, the Epigraph will be submerged eternally.
sentences.chinese: 三峡水库建成后，整个白鹤梁题刻将会淹没于水中。

sentences.english: No. 2 bus form Wujiagang to Three gorges guesthouse.
sentences.chinese: 二路公共汽车是从伍家岗到三峡宾馆的。

sentences.english: The arranging of three-gorges permanent lock chamber is a multi-objective planning problem.
sentences.chinese: 三峡永久船闸的编排问题是一个多目标规划问题。

definition: Three Gorges or Yangtze Gorges, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]
Xiling Gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze, the lower of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Wuxia Gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze, the middle of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Jialing river in Sichuan (a tributary of the Yangtze)
Yangtze River, or Chang Jiang
Fengjie county in Wanzhou suburbs of north Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Han River
Yichang prefecture level city in Hubei
gorge/canyon/mountain valley
Zigui county in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei
Qutang Gorge, 8 km long gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze in Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2 qing4], the upper of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Mt Wu on the Changjiang River (Yangtze) by the Three Gorges
Wushan county in Wanzhou suburbs of north Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Xiajiang county in Ji'an 吉安[Ji2 an1], Jiangxi
Xingshan district of Hegang city 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang/Xingshan county in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei
Qingjiang river in Hubei
